item.description: CycleQD merges skills of experts models in clever ways to create many new models with multiple skills, no fine-tuning required.

item.title: Meta launches open source Llama 3.3, shrinking powerful bigger model into smaller size
item.description: The 70B-Llama 3.3 is specifically optimized for cost-effective inference, with token generation costs as low as $0.01 per million tokens.

item.title: Aethir and partners pour $40M into decentralized infrastructure for AI and blockchain

item.title: Calling all gen AI disruptors of the enterprise! Apply now to present at Transform 2025
